SCTX:
Begin avSlavehunter

float timer

;used in dialogue, set from J'Saddha's script
short followNow

;used for telling them where J'Saddha is
;0 = not done yet, 1 = told them something, -1 = they know you're a liar
short toldSlavehunter

if ( CellChanged == 1 )
	if ( GetJournalIndex HH_TwinLamps1 > 0 )
		if ( GetJournalIndex HH_TwinLamps1 < 100 )
			Enable
			Return
		endif
	endif
	Disable
	Return
endif

if ( timer == -1 )
	Return
endif

if ( timer < 2 )
	Set timer to ( timer + GetSecondsPassed )
	Return
endif

Set timer to 0

if ( GetDistance "j_saddha" < 1024 )
	if ( GetDetected "j_saddha" == 1 )
		StartCombat "j_saddha"
		Set counter to -1
	endif
endif

End
